messages.form: The requested form has been blocked by its owner. If you think this a mistake or you were expecting an available form to sign, please contact the person who gave you the link

essential_cookies_description: We use these essential cookies to perform essential website functions and to provide the services. These cookies enable us to improve performance and user experience. These cookies are necessary for the website to work.
analytics_cookies_description: We allow third parties to use analytics cookies to understand how you use the website so we can make it better. Analytics cookies are used to gather information about the pages you visit.
advertising_cookies_description: We and third parties use advertising cookies to show you new ads based on ads you have already seen. Cookies also track which ads you click or purchases you make after clicking an ad. This is done to show you ads that are more relevant to you and for business purposes with our advertising partners.
name: Name
signup_title: Sign up to create a new account
signup_description: Use a valid email address and a strong password

auth_errors.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS_USE_ANOTHER_EMAIL: User with this email already exists

generic_consent_form.name: Generic consent

simple_research_consent_form.name: Simple research consent form

templates_description: Create your forms from premade templates
my_forms_description: Here you can act on your forms, edit, delete & watch

form_builder.title: Create Your Form
form_builder.description: Customize the form template by filling in your information
form_builder.editable_text_blocks_description: Customize the text content that will appear in your form
form_builder.form_fields_description: Fill in the required information for your form
form_builder.auto_fill_from_another_field_description: You can set a field to be automatically filled with the value of another field. In this case, the field will be read-only and will not be editable.
form_builder.circular_dependency_error: Cannot link to this field because it is already linked to the current field

form_name_placeholder: Give your form a descriptive name
heading: Heading
title: Title
delete_user_form_confirm_message: This cannot be undone. Deleting the form will also prevent them from accessing the link you provided them
user_form_description: General info about the form, and all of its submissions
cookie_banner_description: By clicking “Accept all cookies”, you agree Simple Forms can store cookies on your device and disclose information in accordance with our
regeneration_failed: Failed to send form for regeneration

load_status.minimum: Service is operating at minimum capacity
load_status.low: Service is operating at low capacity
load_status.medium: Service is operating at medium capacity
load_status.high: Service is operating at high capacity
load_status.extreme: Service is at full capacity. Requests are being queued

disable_user_form_confirm_message: This action will block anyone who has a link from accessing the form
enable_user_form_confirm_message: This action will reverse the block and reactivate the form
form_disabled_copy_link_tooltip: You are not allowed to copy a link of a blocked form

form_signed.label: Form signed
form_signed.description: Get notified when a signed form has been created or if we failed to create one. Off by default
